skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the daily question
des:
Every day you’ll be asked a question.
If you get the question right you’ll win $10,000 of fantasy money!

Each time you play for 3 games, you'll get a Mega-Bonus Question.
Get the Mega-Bonus Question right and you’ll win even more fantasy money!

You can hear the question again, by saying, “repeat”.

To play the game, just say “Alexa, open, THE daily question.”

Once you’ve played you can return to the game throughout the day to hear what percentage of players are getting the daily question right.

*** PLEASE NOTE: NO ACTUAL MONETARY PRIZES ARE AWARDED IN THIS GAME. ***

Frequently Asked Questions
-------------------------------------
Q - How can I hear the question again?
A – Just say “Repeat”.

Q - I sometimes forget to play. What can I do?
A - After the game has finished, you can set a reminder by saying, "Alexa, remind me to play the Daily Question every day.” Remember you must wait until the game is finished before saying “Alexa, remind me to play the Daily Question every day.”

Q – Can I spend the money I win on The Daily Question?
A – No, the money you win on the Daily Question is fantasy money.

Q – What is the difference between real money and fantasy money?
A – Fantasy money is just like real money, except it’s fantasy.

Feedback
-------------
I hope you’ll love The Daily Question. 
However, if you have any issues, please let me know on the The Daily Question Facebook page (search for @alexaDailyQuestion) or by e-mail at animal.letters@gmail.com
I'll always do my best to resolve your issue - but if you don't contact me using one of these methods I cannot respond to you.
